short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReviewDio warns users when any Amazon product has video review.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reviewdio is a tool to help you quickly determine if an Amazon Product Listing is a great target for you to create user generated content. 

It will help you determine if it will be worth your time, energy, and resources as a content creator and streamline your decision making process for affiliate generating videos on the Amazon platform.
